extension.summary: Scraper de Videos Musicais TMVDB MQ
extension.description: themoviedb.org is a free and open media database. It's completely user driven by people like you. TMVDB is currently used by millions of people every month and with their powerful API, it is also used by many popular media centers like XBMC to retrieve Movie Metadata, Posters and Fanart to enrich the user's experience.

O themoviedb.org é uma base de dados de mídia livre e aberta. É completamente atualizado por pessoas como você e usado por milhões todos os meses. Com o poderoso motor de busca disponível se tornou o favorito de muitos softwares media center, como o popular XBMC, para obter informação, posters e fanart que enriquecem a experiência do usuário.

addon.name: Media Icons Pack for Aeon MQ 7 - Coloured

extension.summary: Media icons pack for Aeon MQ 7 - coloured
Pacote de etiquetas de mídia para Aeon MQ 7- colorido
extension.description: Media icons pack - coloured - Compatible with skin Aeon MQ 7.
Pacote de etiquetas de mídia - Compatível com a skin Aeon MQ 7.

Resumes the last played media reliably by saving the current media position persisently every couple of seconds (configurable). Therefore it also works when the system gets turned off by power loss. Based von ResumeX by stanley87.

extension.summary: A script for exporting and importing watched states
extension.description: Exports/imports the watched states of movies and TV shows to an XML file. Video files are matched by scraper titles and release year while importing so it is independent of filenames and file locations. Also it takes last watched date into account.

extension.summary: Aeon MQ 7, improved, more light and more powerful than ever.
Aeon MQ 7, melhorada, mais leve e mais poderosa do que nunca.
extension.description: The traditional Aeon MQ reaches its seventh edition.[CR]Reformulated, very simple to use, with a new code that provides a lightweight and powerful skin.[CR]The Aeon MQ 7 incorporates new features such as REPLACE which takes the main menu's level of customization to something never seen before.[CR]Aeon MQ 7, you've never seen a skin like this.

A tradicional Aeon MQ chega a sua sétima edição.[CR]Aeon MQ 7 conta com todos os recursos presentes na versão anterior, no entanto, esses recursos foram otimizados afim de proporcionar uma experiência ainda melhor ao usuário.[CR]Aeon MQ 7, você nunca viu uma skin assim.
